description: Table data source is a table, feature class, or raster that resides in a registered workspace (either a folder or geodatabase). In the case of a geodatabase, if versioned, use version to switch to an alternate geodatabase version. If version is empty or missing, the registered geodatabase version will be used.
title: Table DataSource

___gdbVersion.description: If applicable, the value indicating the version of the geodatabase.

___type.description: String value indicating the type for the dataSource. The value for a Table DataSource is `table`.

___workspaceId.description: The unique string value used to identify the datasource's workspace.

___dataSourceName.description: The fully-qualified string value used to specify where the dataSource is derived.
